siminov.core.exception

Class DatabaseException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • siminov.core.exception.SiminovException
          • siminov.core.exception.DatabaseException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IException

    public class DatabaseException
extends SiminovException
    This is general exception, which is thrown through core database API's, if any exception occur which doing any database operations.
